entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 23. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
